channel.title: Editing what npc's say?
channel.description: hey peoples, i have the funscap3 source and whenever i go into it it says owner is ii justin i but its not its meee!! lol how can i change what every1 is saying? better yet make them say nothing at all?

item.title: Editing what npc's say?
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Go into NPChandler and find ‘ii justin i’ then replace his name with yours. But make sure to change code aswell. Other wise if he logs on your server. It will say your logged in, even if your not.

Read full topic
